The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide

wikitext.*:
On [[15 August]] [[1953]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Ronald Eames''' of [[Allen and Unwin|George Allen & Unwin]].<ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}, pp. 405-6</ref>

*'''Subject''': Reply to a letter from Eames, dated [[14 August]], concerning the typescript of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref name=CG/> 
*'''Publication:''' None.
